title: Citi Third Quarter 2023 Earnings Call
tag-2: NEW YORK — Citigroup will issue its third quarter results via press release at approximately 8 a.m. (ET) on Friday, October 13, 2023. At 11 a.m. (ET), results will be reviewed via live webcast and teleconference.
tag-3: The press release, webcast and presentation materials will be available at https://www.citigroup.com/global/investors/events-and-presentations. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
tag-4: To attend the live webcast and access the replay, please visit: https://www.veracast.com/webcasts/citigroup/webinars/Citi3Q2023.cfm
tag-5: If you’d like to dial into the live earnings call, please call 1-(805) 309-0220 (for U.S. and Canada callers). For international callers, please see the Global Access numbers, linked here: https://www.veracast.com/help/global_access_numbers.pdf. The participant passcode is 7478461.
tag-7: Citi is a preeminent banking partner for institutions with cross-border needs, a global leader in wealth management and a valued personal bank in its home market of the United States. Citi does business in nearly 160 countries and jurisdictions, providing corporations, governments, investors, institutions and individuals with a broad range of financial products and services.
tag-8: Additional information may be found at www.citigroup.com | Twitter: @Citi | LinkedIn: www.linkedin.com/company/citi | YouTube: www.youtube.com/citi | Facebook: www.facebook.com/citi
